title: New Launcher
body: I just opened the league launcher and pressed the button too update too the new launcher. But when i saw how big the update really was i desided that i wanna do this another time when i hav better internet. (I dont have unlimited internet, only 100 gb a month which i share with my family of 4). But everytime i open the launcher again it tries too update. Is there anyway i can cancel this until another time?

replies.body:
As far as I know, you may be able to launch directly into the Legacy Client to bypass this by going into your installation locale (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and launch the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file. 

Let me know if this worked!

This worked for me! Thank you (: 
(having issues with the new client being incredibly laggy) 

Note: You still have to hit launch the legacy client on the login screen page for this to work.
